DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate corneal staining after contact lens instillation with two different multi purpose solutions.
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Evaluation of Two Multipurpose Solutions in Regards to Corneal Staining
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 yrs or older Males or females Any race or ethnic background CL patients using (multipurpose solutions) MPS Patients using Acuvue 2 lenses Corneal refractive surgery within 6 months of this study. Contact lens use on day of examination. Corneal ectasia. Current use of Restasis
